properties.description:
Just about every tree has an outer layer of cork bark, but the cork oak is the primary source of most cork products in the world.
So, why does the cork oak have a thicker layer of cork bark than other trees? The tree evolved to protect itself from the harsh conditions of the forests near the Mediterranean.
The cork is used on the bottems of the keys, it is a thin layer.  Felt is used on the bottem of the cork (I couldn't find where it was made.
properties.title: cork

properties.description: Steel is used for the springs in the flute along with all the little pins and screws.
properties.title: steel

properties.description:
By Sierra
This source map is the one showing the process of making a flute.
When I started this project I berly knew what I supply chain is, but now I know what it is and how it works. On a deeper level too, how flutes are made.  Now when ever I buy or consume something I am thinking about how it's made and where it comes from.  I knew that some products had a lot of ingertens, but I didn't realize that there are a lot of this that go into products that we don't even know what they are.  It was also crazy to see that some products don't even come from anywhere near the US 'till distrubution or manufunctoring, even something that has only 4 or so fondation products.  This project made me thanful for the unseen people that put in so much hard work and labor to make the simplest things.  It also made me more aware and cousios about some foods or/and products.
properties.title: metal to music
